marklogic.body: Original took place in Louisiana. I'm all for this.... Phylicia Rashad as Clairee... Spot on!!! She'll be perfect. "Steel Magnolias" has Always been a huge guilty pleasure of mine, and the chance to adapt this Southern classic, but told from a different Southern perspective, is welcome. After all, this was a play, too, and has been remade for the stage countless times... why not remake it as a film but with a twist? Love it!!
